Name: Sword and Adventurer
About the game: Introduction Sword and Adventurer is an 3D Action-RPG.You can choose one of the three heroes of warrior, rouge, and mage for adventure.They all have very different skills. You can defeat monsters to get equipment.Upgrade your character.Finally, defeat the demon king and save the city. Game control Use the W, A, S, D key to move. Hold the right button to rotate the camera. Click the left button to attack,and use the number key to cast skill.
